title: Backpacker fell to her death while walking naked along Guatemalan mountain trail to watch sunrise, inquest told
text:
A backpacker fell to her death while walking naked along a Guatemalan mountain trail to watch the sunrise, an inquest heard.

Catherine Shaw, 23, was feared to have been murdered when her body was found near San Juan La Laguna on March 5.

Local police initially suspected foul play because her clothes had been removed and her head and legs had been injured.

But Ms Shaw's family have accepted that she probably fell after taking her clothes off so she could enjoy the sunshine more after climbing up a volcano hill alone.

Her father Tarquin Shaw told Oxford Coroners' Court on Thursday: "This is something she was quite capable of.
description: A backpacker fell to her death while walking naked along a Guatemalan mountain trail to watch the sunrise, an inquest heard.
